attributes.action: legalize offers made to house sellers with a cool off period of 1 week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm from the Netherlands and came in touch with this crazy system when we moved over here. Why not legalize offers with a cool off period of 1 week (like in France and NL). Saves a lot of grief and negative tension and house buyers are more committed when they put in an offer.
